label: 肘壷金具
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 57th  . Nara National Museum . 2005
説明文: A hinge used on doors and attached lids, the most common type has a hook-like male part that is inserted into a circular female part (vessel). This type of hinge differs from a butterfly hinge in that the door or lid can be completely separated from the frame or base.
